page.title: 10ALL ABOUT ME
page.content: My name is Sarah. I am nine years old. I live at 37,Harewood Crescent. I go to Oakworth First School and next year will go to Bronte Middle School. I have lots to do after school. On Monday I go to swimming lessons, on Tuesday, dancing lessons, Brownies on Wednesday and Joy Club on Friday. My favourite television programmes are Dallas and Top of the Pops. I collect fancy rubbers and posters. First thing in the morning I find it hard to wake up. When I finally get up I dress and get my things ready for school. At school we usually read. After reading we either do Maths, English or Art and Craft and then we have assembly. When we go home I watch television and sometimes go out for tea. I go to bed between 9.00p.m. and 10.30p.m.
